headline: How The Narrative On Tyler Technologies (TYL) Is Shifting As Valuation Assumptions Reset
summary: Tyler Technologies is in focus after our fair value estimate shifted from US$603.14 to US$439.90, a sizeable reset that puts valuation assumptions under a brighter spotlight. That change lines up with Street research that has turned more cautious, as several firms trim their price targets while bulls and bears debate growth durability, execution risk, and what counts as a reasonable premium today. As you read on, you will see how these moving targets fit into the broader analyst narrative and...
